channel.title: [PI] Giving stats requirement
channel.description:
Hi, i want to ask, about that how can i give weapons and armors some requirements like i have glitches like people can wear chaotics, spirit shields, dfs , etc with 3 combat level. I mean there is no requirement.
Where can i make them having a stat requirement?
Please help me.

item.title: [PI] Giving stats requirement
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

[quote=“zattion, post:2, topic:363723”]Go to itemassist. And search for attacklevelreq or something and just make a new string for ur custom. Tell me if u need more help[/quote]They’re integers, not Strings.

Read full topic

item.description:

Go to itemassist. And search for attacklevelreq or something and just make a new string for ur custom. Tell me if u need more help
